alert.note: Alert for Hocking (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 03 at 3:12PM EST until January 03 at 11:52PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Hocking County Ohio. * WHEN...Until 630 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 312 PM EST, Department of transportation reported high water on area roadways in southern Hocking County due to earlier rainfall. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Logan, Nelsonville, Hocking Hills State Park, Starr, Laurelville, Murray City, Adelphi, Ilesboro, Lake Logan State Park, Union Furnace, Gibisonville, Haydenville, South Bloomingville, Carbon Hill and Oreville.
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. To report flooding, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
